law.catch_line: Registered Office And Registered Agent Of Foreign Corporation

text.section: a registered office that may be the same as any of its places of business; and
a registered agent, who may be:
an individual who resides in the commonwealth and whose business office is identical with the registered office;
a domestic corporation, not-for-profit domestic corporation or domestic limited liability company whose business office is identical with the registered office; or

a foreign corporation, foreign not-for-profit corporation or foreign limited liability company authorized to transact business in the commonwealth whose business office is identical with the registered office.
